Title: Provides for the transfer of at least $300,000 of unexpended moneys to the division of state police for provision of class B technical uniforms for members of the bureau of criminal investigation
Summary: Provides for the transfer of at least $300,000 of unexpended moneys to the division of state police for provision of class B technical uniforms for members of the bureau of criminal investigation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring the transfer and appropriation, for the purpose of providing class B technical uniforms for all investigators, senior investigators and investigative specialists in the division of state police, a portion of any unexpended moneys remaining in the state treasury at the end of the 2019-2020 state fiscal year
